text: Branko Cvejić (; born 25 August 1946) is a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films since 1962. Cvejić was director of the Yugoslav Drama Theatre from 2002 to 2011. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- |+Film ! Year ! Title !
